methods.name: get_accounts
methods.description: Retrieves a list of accounts on the Hedera network with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Filter by specific account ID, alias, or EVM address

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of accounts to return (default varies)

use_cases: List all accounts on the network
Find accounts with specific balance ranges
Search for accounts by public key

methods.name: get_account
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific account, including optional transaction history.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to include

use_cases: Check account balance and token holdings

methods.name: get_account_nfts
methods.description: Retrieves all NFTs owned by a specific account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of NFTs to return

use_cases: List all NFTs owned by an account
Find specific NFTs by serial number
Check NFT ownership and delegation status

methods.name: get_account_staking_rewards
methods.description: Retrieves staking rewards earned by an account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of reward records to return

use_cases: Calculate total staking rewards for an account
Analyze staking reward patterns over time

methods.name: get_account_tokens
methods.description: Retrieves token relationships (associations) for an account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of token relationships to return

use_cases: List tokens associated with an account
Check token balances and freeze/KYC status

methods.name: get_account_pending_airdrops
methods.description: Retrieves pending airdrops that an account can claim.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of airdrops to return

methods.name: get_account_outstanding_airdrops
methods.description: Retrieves airdrops that an account has sent but recipients haven't claimed yet.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of airdrops to return

methods.name: get_account_crypto_allowances
methods.description: Retrieves HBAR allowances granted by an account to spenders.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of allowances to return

methods.name: get_account_token_allowances
methods.description: Retrieves token allowances granted by an account to spenders.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of allowances to return

methods.name: get_account_nft_allowances
methods.description: Retrieves NFT allowances (approvals) granted by an account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account ID, alias, or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of allowances to return

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Whether account is owner or spender

nested.name: approved_for_all
nested.description: Whether approved for all NFTs in collection

methods.name: get_balances
methods.description: Retrieves account balances for HBAR and tokens at a specific point in time.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of balance records to return

methods.name: get_blocks
methods.description: Retrieves blocks from the Hedera network with filtering options.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of blocks to return

use_cases: Find blocks by number or time

methods.name: get_block
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific block.

parameters.name: hash_or_number
parameters.description: Block hash or block number - REQUIRED

methods.name: call_contract
methods.description: Executes a read-only smart contract function call.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Contract call parameters including contract ID, function name, and parameters - REQUIRED

methods.name: get_contracts
methods.description: Retrieves a list of deployed smart contracts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of contracts to return

methods.name: get_contract
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific smart contract.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract ID or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Get contract state at specific timestamp

methods.name: get_contract_results
methods.description: Retrieves smart contract execution results and logs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

methods.name: get_contract_result
methods.description: Retrieves a specific contract execution result.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract ID or EVM address - REQUIRED

methods.name: get_contract_result_by_transaction
methods.description: Retrieves contract execution result by transaction ID or hash.

methods.name: get_contract_logs
methods.description: Retrieves smart contract event logs with filtering.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of logs to return

methods.name: get_contract_state
methods.description: Retrieves the storage state of a smart contract.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract ID or EVM address - REQUIRED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of state entries to return

methods.name: get_network_exchange_rate
methods.description: Retrieves the current HBAR to USD exchange rate used by the network.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Get exchange rate at specific timestamp

methods.name: get_network_fees
methods.description: Retrieves the current network transaction fees.

methods.name: get_network_nodes
methods.description: Retrieves information about network consensus nodes.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: Filter by address book file ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of nodes to return

methods.name: get_network_stake
methods.description: Retrieves network-wide staking information.

structure.name: max_stake_rewarded
structure.description: Maximum stake that can be rewarded

structure.name: max_staking_reward_rate_per_hbar
structure.description: Max staking reward rate per HBAR

methods.name: get_network_supply
methods.description: Retrieves HBAR supply information for the network.

methods.name: get_schedules
methods.description: Retrieves scheduled transactions on the network.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of schedules to return

methods.name: get_schedule
methods.description: Retrieves details for a specific scheduled transaction.

methods.name: get_transactions
methods.description: Retrieves transactions from the network with extensive filtering options.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return

use_cases: Filter transactions by type or account

methods.name: get_transaction
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific transaction.

methods.name: get_topic
methods.description: Retrieves information about a consensus topic.

methods.name: get_topic_messages
methods.description: Retrieves messages submitted to a consensus topic.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to return

methods.name: get_topic_message
methods.description: Retrieves a specific message from a consensus topic.

methods.name: get_topic_message_by_timestamp
methods.description: Retrieves a topic message by its timestamp.

methods.name: get_tokens
methods.description: Retrieves tokens deployed on the network with filtering options.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of tokens to return

use_cases: Find tokens by name or type

methods.name: get_token
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific token.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Get token state at specific timestamp

methods.name: get_token_balances
methods.description: Retrieves balance information for all holders of a specific token.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of balance records to return

methods.name: get_token_nfts
methods.description: Retrieves all NFTs for a specific token collection.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of NFTs to return

methods.name: get_nft
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific NFT.

methods.name: get_nft_transaction_history
methods.description: Retrieves the complete transaction history for a specific NFT.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return

methods.name: get_accounts_paginated
methods.description: Automatically handles pagination for account queries, yielding all results across multiple pages.

structure.name: iterator
structure.description: Iterator yielding pages of account data

methods.name: get_transactions_paginated
methods.description: Automatically handles pagination for transaction queries, yielding all results across multiple pages.

structure.name: iterator
structure.description: Iterator yielding pages of transaction data
